original_text:
Those who have believing masters must not be disrespectful on the ground that they are brothers; rather they must serve all the better since those who benefit by their good service are believers and beloved.
Teach and urge these things.
korean_text: 믿는 상전이 있는 자들은 그 상전을 형제라고 가볍게 여기지 말고 더 잘 섬기게 하라 이는 유익을 받는 자들이 믿는 자요 사랑을 받는 자임이라 너는 이것들을 가르치고 권하라

sentences.original_text: on the ground that they are brothers
rather they must serve all the better
since those who benefit by their good service
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 좋은 봉사로 혜택을 받는 자들은
